00026 bool ctxVectorMapErrorOccurred = false;
00027 
00028 bool VectorMap::loadMap(const char* name, bool usePreRender)
00029 {
00030   static const bool debug = false;
00031   static const bool debugBitmap = false;
00032   static const bool debugVector = false;
00033   
00034   char vectorFile[4096];
00035   char renderFile[4096];
00036   FILE * pFile;
00037   
00038   mapName = string(name);
00039   
00040   snprintf(vectorFile, 4095, "%s/%s/%s_vector.txt",mapsFolder.c_str(),name,name);
00041   snprintf(renderFile, 4095, "%s/%s/%s_render.dat",mapsFolder.c_str(),name,name);
00042   if(debug) printf("Loading map: %s\n",name);
00043   
00044   //Read Vector data
00045   if(debug) printf("Loading vector map from %s\n",vectorFile);
00046   pFile = fopen (vectorFile,"r");
00047   if(pFile==NULL){
00048     char buf[1024];
00049     snprintf(buf, 1023, "Unable to load vector file %s!",vectorFile);
00050     TerminalWarning(buf);
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   float x1,y1,x2,y2;
00054   minX = minY = FLT_MAX;
00055   maxX = maxY = -FLT_MAX;
00056   lines.clear();
00057   while(fscanf(pFile,"%f,%f,%f,%f",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2)==4){
00058     if(debugVector) printf("Line%d: <%f %f> <%f %f>\n",(int)lines.size(),x1,y1,x2,y2);
00059     minX = min(minX,x1);
00060     minX = min(minX,x2);
00061     minY = min(minY,y1);
00062     minY = min(minY,y2);
00063     maxX = max(maxX,x1);
00064     maxX = max(maxX,x2);
00065     maxY = max(maxY,y1);
00066     maxY = max(maxY,y2);
00067     vector2f p0(x1,y1);
00068     vector2f p1(x2,y2);
00069     
00070     lines.push_back(line2f(p0,p1));
00071     lines.at(lines.size()-1).calcValues();
00072   }
00073   if(debug) printf("%d lines loaded into vector map\n",(int)lines.size());
00074   if(debug) printf("Extents: %.3f,%.3f : %.3f,%.3f\n",minX, minY, maxX, maxY);
00075   fclose(pFile);
00076   
00077   //Read Pre-Render data
00078   preRenderExists = false;
00079   if(usePreRender){
00080     pFile = fopen(renderFile, "r");
00081     if(pFile==NULL){
00082       char buf[1024];
00083       snprintf(buf, 1023, "Unable to load pre-render file %s!",renderFile);
00084       TerminalWarning(buf);
00085     }else{
00086       bool error = false;
00087       int x=0, y=0;
00088       int cnt = 0;
00089       error = fread(&visListWidth,sizeof(unsigned int),1,pFile)!=1;
00090       error = error || (fread(&visListHeight,sizeof(unsigned int),1,pFile)!=1);
00091       error = error || (fread(&visListResolution,sizeof(double),1,pFile)!=1);
00092       if(!error){
00093         if(debug) printf("Pre-render size: %d x %d, resolution: %.3f\n",visListWidth, visListHeight, visListResolution);
00094         visibilityList.resize(visListWidth);
00095         for(int i=0; i<visListWidth; i++)
00096           visibilityList[i].resize(visListHeight);
00097       }
00098       while(cnt<visListHeight*visListWidth && !error){
00099         int size = 0;
00100         error = fread(&x,sizeof(int),1,pFile)!=1;
00101         error = error || (fread(&y,sizeof(int),1,pFile)!=1);
00102         error = error || (fread(&size,sizeof(int),1,pFile)!=1);
00103         
00104         if(x<0 || y<0 || x>visListWidth-1 || y>visListHeight-1){
00105           char msg[4096];
00106           snprintf(msg, 4095, "Invalid loc (%d,%d) in pre-render file",x,y);
00107           TerminalWarning(msg);
00108           error = true;
00109         }
00110         visibilityList[x][y].resize(size);
00111         
00112         error = error || (fread(visibilityList[x][y].data(),sizeof(int),size,pFile) != size);
00113         
00114         if(!error && debug && ((y+1)*100)%visListHeight==0){
00115           int progress = (y+1)*100/visListHeight;
00116           printf("\rReading pre-render file... %3d%% ",progress);
00117           fflush(stdout);
00118         }
00119         if(!error)
00120           cnt++;
00121       }
00122       if(error){
00123         char buf[1024];
00124         snprintf(buf, 1023, "\nUnable to parse pre-render file %s",renderFile);
00125         TerminalWarning(buf);
00126         preRenderExists = false;
00127       }else{
00128         if(debug) printf("\nRead %d locations into visibility list\n",cnt);
00129         preRenderExists = true;
00130       }
00131     }
00132   }
00133   
00134   if(debug) printf("Done loading map\n\n");
00135   return true;
00136 }

00139 VectorMap::VectorMap(const char* name, const char* _mapsFolder, bool usePreRender)
00140 {
00141   mapsFolder=string(_mapsFolder);
00142   loadMap(name, usePreRender);
00143   //initOpenGL();
00144 }

00146 VectorMap::~VectorMap()
00147 {
00148 }
00149 
00150 std::vector< int >* VectorMap::getVisibilityList(float x, float y)
00151 {
00152   int xInd = bound((x-minX)/visListResolution,0.0,visListWidth-1.0);
00153   int yInd = bound((y-minY)/visListResolution,0.0,visListHeight-1.0);
00154   return &visibilityList[xInd][yInd];
00155 }
00156 
00157 vector<float> VectorMap::getRayCast(vector2f loc, float angle, float da, int numRays, float minRange, float maxRange)
00158 {
00159   static const bool UsePreRender = true;
00160   float intervals = numRays - 1.0;
00161   float a0 = angle - 0.5*intervals*da;
00162   float a1 = angle + 0.5*intervals*da;
00163   vector<float> rayCast;
00164   rayCast.clear();
00165   vector< int >* visibilityList;
00166   
00167   for(float a=a0; a<a1; a += da){
00168     float ray = maxRange;
00169     if(preRenderExists && UsePreRender){
00170       visibilityList = getVisibilityList(loc);
00171       for(unsigned int i=0; i<visibilityList->size(); i++){
00172         int lineIndex = visibilityList->at(i);
00173         float curRay = maxRange;
00174         if(lines[lineIndex].intersects((vector2f)loc,(float)a)){
00175           line2f &l = lines[lineIndex];
00176           //curRay = l.distFromLine1((vector2f)loc,(double)a, false);
00177           {
00178             vector2f heading;
00179             heading.heading(a);
00180             if(l.intersects(loc,heading,true)){
00181               float sinTheta = l.Dir().cross(heading.norm());
00182               curRay = fabs(l.Perp().dot(loc-l.P0())/sinTheta);
00183             }else{
00184               curRay = NAN;
00185             }
00186           }
00187           if(curRay<0.0){
00188             TerminalWarning("Ray Cast Fail!");
00189             printf("line: %.3f,%.3f : %.3f,%.3f loc:%.3f,%.3f a:%.1f\u00b0 curRay:%f\n",V2COMP(lines[lineIndex].P0()),V2COMP(lines[lineIndex].P1()),V2COMP(loc),DEG(a),curRay);
00190             fflush(stdout);
00191             while(1){
00192               Sleep(0.05);
00193             }
00194             //exit(0);
00195             //alarm(1);
00196           }
00197           ray = min(ray, curRay);
00198         }
00199       }
00200     }else{
00201       /*
00202       for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
00203         if(lines[i].intersects(loc,a))
00204           ray = min(ray, lines[i].distFromLine1((vector2f)loc,(double)a, false));
00205       }
00206       */
00207       vector<int> sceneLines = getSceneLines(loc, maxRange);
00208       for(unsigned int i=0; i<sceneLines.size(); i++){
00209         if(lines[sceneLines[i]].intersects(loc,a)){
00210           ray = min(ray, lines[sceneLines[i]].distFromLine1((vector2f)loc,(float)a, false));
00211         }
00212       }
00213       
00214     }
00215     rayCast.push_back(ray);
00216   }
00217   return rayCast;
00218 }
00219 
00220 int VectorMap::getLineCorrespondence(vector2f loc, float angle, float minRange, float maxRange, const std::vector< int >& visibilityList)
00221 {
00222   vector2f loc1, loc2, dir;
00223   dir.heading(angle);
00224   loc1 = loc + minRange*dir;
00225   loc2 = loc + maxRange*dir;
00226   
00227   vector2f p = loc2;
00228   int bestLine = -1;
00229   for(unsigned int i=0; i<visibilityList.size(); i++){
00230     int lineIndex = visibilityList[i];
00231     if(!lines[lineIndex].intersects(loc1,loc2,false,false,true))
00232       continue;
00233     
00234     vector2f p2 = lines[lineIndex].intersection(loc1,loc2,false,false);
00235     if( (p2-loc).sqlength()<(p-loc).sqlength()){
00236       p = p2;
00237       bestLine = lineIndex;
00238     }
00239   }
00240   return bestLine;
00241 }
00242 
00243 vector<int> VectorMap::getRayToLineCorrespondences(vector2f loc, float angle, float a0, float a1, const vector<vector2f> pointCloud, float minRange, float maxRange, bool analytical, vector<line2f> *lines )
00244 {
00245   //FunctionTimer ft(__FUNCTION__);
00246   static const bool UsePreRender = true;
00247   
00248   vector<int> correspondences;
00249   correspondences.clear();
00250   vector<int> locVisibilityList;
00251   if(UsePreRender && preRenderExists)
00252     locVisibilityList = *getVisibilityList(loc);
00253   else
00254     getSceneLines(loc,maxRange);
00255   
00256   if(analytical && lines!=NULL){
00257     *lines = sceneRender(loc, a0, a1);
00258     vector<LineSegment> segments = sortLineSegments(loc,*lines);
00259     float rotMat1[4] = {cos(angle), -sin(angle), sin(angle), cos(angle)};
00260     vector2f p(0.0,0.0);
00261     correspondences.resize(pointCloud.size());
00262     for(int i=0; i<pointCloud.size(); i++){
00263       p = pointCloud[i];
00264       p.set(p.x*rotMat1[0] + p.y*rotMat1[1], p.x*rotMat1[2] + p.y*rotMat1[3]);
00265       int correspondence = -1;
00266       
00267       for(int j=0; j<segments.size() && correspondence<0; j++){
00268         if(segments[j].v0.cross(p)>=0.0f && segments[j].v1.cross(p)<=0.0f)
00269           correspondence = segments[j].index;
00270       }
00271       correspondences[i] = correspondence;
00272     }
00273   }else{
00274     for(int i=0; i<pointCloud.size(); i++){
00275       float curAngle = angle_mod(pointCloud[i].angle() + angle);
00276       correspondences.push_back(getLineCorrespondence(loc,curAngle,minRange, maxRange, locVisibilityList));
00277     }
00278   }
00279   return correspondences;
00280 }
00281 
00282 vector<int> VectorMap::getRayToLineCorrespondences(vector2f loc, float a0, float a1, float da, float minRange, float maxRange)
00283 {
00284   //FunctionTimer ft(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00285   vector<int> correspondences;
00286   correspondences.clear();
00287   vector<int> locVisibilityList;
00288   if(preRenderExists)
00289     locVisibilityList = *getVisibilityList(loc);
00290   else
00291     locVisibilityList = getSceneLines(loc,maxRange);
00292   for(float a=a0; a<a1; a += da){
00293     correspondences.push_back(getLineCorrespondence(loc,a,minRange, maxRange, locVisibilityList));
00294   }
00295   return correspondences;
00296 }
00297 
00298 vector< VectorMap::LineSegment > VectorMap::sortLineSegments(vector2f& loc, vector< line2f >& lines)
00299 {
00300   static const float eps = RAD(0.001);
00301   vector< VectorMap::LineSegment > segments;
00302   segments.clear();
00303   for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
00304     float a0 = angle_pos((lines[i].P0()-loc).angle());
00305     float a1 = angle_pos((lines[i].P1()-loc).angle());
00306     if((lines[i].P0()-loc).cross(lines[i].P1()-loc)<0.0)
00307       swap(a0,a1);
00308     LineSegment curSegment;
00309     curSegment.a0 = a0;
00310     curSegment.a1 = a1;
00311     curSegment.index = i;
00312     curSegment.v0.heading(a0);
00313     curSegment.v1.heading(a1);
00314     
00315     if(segments.size()<1){
00316       segments.push_back(curSegment);
00317       continue;
00318     }
00319     
00320     //Special case: line intersects the x axis, so curSegment MUST be the first segment
00321     if(a0>a1){
00322       segments.insert(segments.begin(), curSegment);
00323       continue;
00324     }
00325     unsigned int j=0;
00326     bool found = false;
00327     for(; j<segments.size()-1 && !found; j++){
00328       if( segments[j].a1<=a0+eps && segments[j+1].a0>=a1-eps )
00329         found = true;
00330     }
00331     
00332     if(found && j<segments.size())
00333       segments.insert(segments.begin()+j,curSegment);
00334     else
00335       segments.push_back(curSegment);
00336   }
00337   
00338   if(segments.size()>0){
00339     if(segments[0].a0>segments[0].a1){
00340       LineSegment curSegment;
00341       curSegment.a0 = segments[0].a0;
00342       curSegment.a1 = M_2PI;
00343       curSegment.index = segments[0].index;
00344       segments[0].a0 = 0.0;
00345       segments.push_back(curSegment);
00346     }
00347   }
00348   
00349   return segments;
00350 }
00351 
00352 vector<int> VectorMap::getRayToLineCorrespondences(vector2f loc, float angle, float da, int numRays, float minRange, float maxRange, bool analytical, vector< line2f > *lines)
00353 {
00354   //FunctionTimer ft("getRayToLineCorrespondences");
00355   float intervals = numRays - 1.0;
00356   float a0 = angle - 0.5*intervals*da;
00357   float a1 = angle + 0.5*intervals*da;
00358   
00359   if(analytical && (lines!=NULL)){
00360     //FunctionTimer ft("Analytic Render");
00361     a0 = angle_pos(a0);
00362     *lines = sceneRender(loc,a0,a1);
00363     vector< VectorMap::LineSegment > segments = sortLineSegments(loc,*lines);
00364     vector<int> correspondences;
00365     correspondences.clear();
00366     for(unsigned int i=0; i<numRays; i++){
00367       correspondences.push_back(-1);
00368     }
00369     int maxScanRays = floor((float)M_2PI/da);
00370     
00371     for(unsigned int i=0; i<segments.size(); i++){
00372       float aStart = segments[i].a0;
00373       float aEnd = segments[i].a1;
00374       if(aEnd<aStart)
00375         aEnd += M_2PI;
00376       int index = ceil( (float) (aStart - a0)/da );
00377       if(index<0)
00378         index+=maxScanRays;
00379       for(float a = aStart; a<aEnd; a+=da, index++){
00380         int j = index%maxScanRays;
00381         if(j<numRays){
00382           correspondences[j] = segments[i].index;
00383         }
00384       }
00385     }
00386     
00387     return correspondences;
00388   }else
00389     return getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc,a0,a1,da,minRange,maxRange);
00390 }
00391 
00392 std::vector<int> VectorMap::getSceneLines(vector2f loc, float maxRange)
00393 {
00394   static const float eps = 1e-6;
00395   vector<int> linesList, sceneLines;
00396   vector<line2f> tmpList;
00397   linesList.clear();
00398   sceneLines.clear();
00399   
00400   for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
00401     if(lines[i].closestDistFromLine(loc, true)<maxRange)
00402       linesList.push_back(i);
00403   }
00404   for(unsigned int i=0; i<linesList.size(); i++){
00405     line2f curLine = lines[linesList[i]];
00406     //Check if any part of curLine is unoccluded by present list of lines, as seen from loc
00407     for(unsigned int j=0;j<linesList.size() && curLine.Length()>=eps; j++){
00408       if(i==j)
00409         continue;
00410       if(lines[linesList[j]].Length()<eps)
00411         continue;
00412       trimOcclusion(loc, lines[linesList[j]], curLine,tmpList);
00413     }
00414     if( curLine.Length()>eps ){ //At least part of curLine is unoccluded
00415       sceneLines.push_back(linesList[i]);
00416     }
00417   }
00418   return sceneLines;
00419 }
00420 
00421 inline float cross(const Eigen::Vector3f &v1, const Eigen::Vector3f &v2)
00422 {
00423   return v1.cross(v2).z();
00424 }
00425 
00426 static const float eps = 1e-5;
00427 
00428 inline bool lineIntersectsLine(const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p1, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_dir,
00429                                const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p1, const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_dir)
00430 {
00431   return cross(l1_dir,l2_p0-l1_p0)*cross(l1_dir,l2_p1-l1_p0)<eps && cross(l2_dir,l1_p0-l2_p0)*cross(l2_dir,l1_p1-l2_p0)<eps;
00432 }
00433 
00434 inline bool lineIntersectsRay(const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p1,
00435                                const Eigen::Vector3f &r_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &r_dir)
00436 {
00437   return cross(l1_p0-r_p0,r_dir)*cross(l1_p1-r_p0,r_dir)<eps;
00438 }
00439 
00440 inline vector2f tovector2f(const Eigen::Vector3f &v)
00441 {
00442   return vector2f(v.x(),v.y());
00443 }
00444 
00445 inline Eigen::Vector3f lineIntersectionLine(const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p1, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_dir,
00446                                      const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p1, const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_dir)
00447 { 
00448   float den = cross(l2_dir, l1_dir);
00449   float ua = cross(l1_p0-l2_p0, l1_dir)/den;
00450   return l2_p0 + ua*l2_dir;
00451 }
00452 
00453 inline Eigen::Vector3f lineIntersectionLine(const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l1_p1,
00454                                             const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p0, const Eigen::Vector3f &l2_p1)
00455 { 
00456   Eigen::Vector3f l1_dir(l1_p1-l1_p0), l2_dir(l2_p1-l2_p0);
00457   float den = cross(l2_dir, l1_dir);
00458   float ua = cross(l1_p0-l2_p0, l1_dir)/den;
00459   return l2_p0 + ua*l2_dir;
00460 }
00461 
00462 void VectorMap::trimOcclusion2(vector2f& loc_g, line2f& line1, line2f& line2, vector< line2f >& sceneLines)
00463 {  
00464   using namespace Eigen;
00465   // Checks if any part of line2 is occluded by line1 when seen from loc, and if so, line2 is trimmed accordingly, adding sub-lines to sceneLines if necessary
00466   static const float eps = 1e-4;
00467   static const float sqeps = 1e-8;
00468   if(line1.Length()<eps || line2.Length()<eps)
00469     return;
00470   
00471   Vector3f loc(V2COMP(loc_g),0);
00472   Vector3f l1_p0(V2COMP(line1.P0()),0);
00473   Vector3f l1_p1(V2COMP(line1.P1()),0);
00474   Vector3f l1_dir(l1_p1-l1_p0);
00475   Vector3f l1_r0(l1_p0-loc);
00476   Vector3f l1_r1(l1_p1-loc);
00477   Vector3f l2_p0(V2COMP(line2.P0()),0);
00478   Vector3f l2_p1(V2COMP(line2.P1()),0);
00479   Vector3f l2_dir(l2_p1-l2_p0);
00480   Vector3f l2_r0(l2_p0-loc);
00481   Vector3f l2_r1(l2_p1-loc);
00482   
00483   vector2f l1_p0_g(line1.P0());
00484   vector2f l1_p1_g(line1.P1());
00485   vector2f l2_p0_g(line2.P0());
00486   vector2f l2_p1_g(line2.P1());
00487   
00488   //Ensure that r0 vector to r1 vector is in the positive right-handed order
00489   if( cross(l1_r0,l1_r1)<0.0 ){
00490     swap(l1_r0,l1_r1);
00491     swap(l1_p0,l1_p1);
00492   }
00493   if( cross(l2_r0,l2_r1)<0.0 ){
00494     swap(l2_r0,l2_r1);
00495     swap(l2_p0,l2_p1);
00496   }
00497   
00498   if( (cross(l1_r0, l2_r0)>=0.0 && cross(l1_r1, l2_r0)>=0.0) || (cross(l2_r1, l1_r0)>=0.0 && cross(l2_r1, l2_r1)>=0.0) )
00499     return; //No Line interaction
00500     bool intersects, rayOcclusion1, rayOcclusion2;
00501   
00502   //completeOcclusion = line1.intersects(loc,l2_p0,false, false, true) && line1.intersects(loc,l2_p1,false, false, true);
00503   
00504   //intersects = line2.intersects(line1,false,false,false);
00505   //rayOcclusion1 = line2.intersects(loc,l1_r0, false); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p0 intersects line2
00506   //rayOcclusion2 = line2.intersects(loc,l1_r1, false); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p1 intersects line2
00507   
00508   intersects = lineIntersectsLine(l1_p0,l1_p1,l1_dir, l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir);
00509   rayOcclusion1 = lineIntersectsRay(l2_p0,l2_p1, loc,l1_r0); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p0 intersects line2
00510   rayOcclusion2 = lineIntersectsRay(l2_p0,l2_p1, loc,l1_r1); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p1 intersects line2
00511   
00512   Vector3f p, mid;
00513   if(intersects){
00514     //line1 and line2 intersect
00515     //mid = line2.intersection(line1,false,false);
00516     mid = lineIntersectionLine(l1_p0,l1_p1,l1_dir, l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir);
00517     if( cross((l1_p0-mid), l2_p0-mid) > 0.0){
00518       //Delete the right hand part of line2
00519       line2 = line2f(tovector2f(mid),l2_p1_g);
00520       //line2f l(tovector2f(mid), l2_p0_g);
00521       //if(l.intersects(loc,l1_r0,false)){
00522       if(lineIntersectsRay(mid,l2_p0, loc, l1_r0)){
00523         //p = l.intersection(loc,l1_p0,false, true);
00524         p = lineIntersectionLine(mid, l2_p0, loc,l1_p0);
00525         if((l2_p0-p).squaredNorm()>sqeps)  //Part of the right hand part of line2 extends beyond line1, it may still be visible
00526           sceneLines.push_back(line2f(l2_p0_g, tovector2f(p)));
00527       }
00528     }else{
00529       //Delete the left hand part of line2
00530       line2 = line2f(l2_p0_g,tovector2f(mid));
00531       //line2f l(mid, l2_p1);
00532       //if(l.intersects(loc,l1_r1,false)){
00533       if(lineIntersectsRay(mid,l2_p1, loc, l1_r1)){
00534         //p = l.intersection(loc,l1_p1,false, true);
00535         p = lineIntersectionLine(mid, l2_p0, loc,l1_p1);
00536         if((l2_p1-p).squaredNorm()>sqeps)  //Part of the left hand part of line2 extends beyond line1, it may still be visible
00537           sceneLines.push_back(line2f(l2_p1_g, tovector2f(p)));
00538       }
00539     }
00540   }else{ 
00541     bool completeOcclusion = line1.intersects(line2f(loc_g,l2_p0_g),false, false, true) && line1.intersects(line2f(loc_g,l2_p1_g),false, false, true);
00542     
00543     bool occlusion0 = rayOcclusion1 && !line2.intersects(line2f(loc_g,l1_p0_g), false, false, false);  // line1.p0 is in front of, and occludes line2
00544     bool occlusion1 = rayOcclusion2 && !line2.intersects(line2f(loc_g,l1_p1_g), false, false, false); // line1.p1 is in front of, and occludes line2
00545     if(completeOcclusion){
00546       //Trim the line to zero length
00547       line2 = line2f(0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0);
00548     }else if(occlusion0 && occlusion1){
00549       //line2 is partially occluded in the middle by line1. Break up into 2 segments, make line2 one segment, push back the other segment to the sceneLines list
00550       //mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc,l1_p0),false, true);
00551       mid = lineIntersectionLine(l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir,loc,l1_p0,l1_r0);
00552       // newLine2 = the unoccluded part of line2 at its right hand end
00553       line2f newLine2(l2_p0_g,tovector2f(mid));
00554       //mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc_g,l1_p1_g),false, true);
00555       mid = lineIntersectionLine(l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir,loc,l1_p1,l1_r1);
00556       line2 = newLine2;
00557       // save the unoccluded part of line2 at its left hand end, if any
00558       if((mid-l2_p1).squaredNorm()>sqeps)
00559         sceneLines.push_back(line2f(tovector2f(mid),l2_p1_g));
00560     }else if(occlusion0){
00561       //The left hand end of line2 is occluded, trim it
00562       //vector2f mid = line2.intersection(loc,l1_p0,false, true);
00563       mid = lineIntersectionLine(l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir,loc,l1_p0,l1_r0);
00564       line2 = line2f(l2_p0_g,tovector2f(mid));
00565     }else if(occlusion1){
00566       //The right hand end of line2 is occluded, trim it
00567       //vector2f mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc,l1_p1),false, true);
00568       mid = lineIntersectionLine(l2_p0,l2_p1,l2_dir,loc,l1_p1,l1_r1);
00569       line2 = line2f(tovector2f(mid),l2_p1_g);
00570     }
00571   }
00572 }
00573 
00574 void VectorMap::trimOcclusion(vector2f& loc, line2f& line1, line2f& line2, vector< line2f >& sceneLines)
00575 {
00576   // Checks if any part of line2 is occluded by line1 when seen from loc, and if so, line2 is trimmed accordingly, adding sub-lines to sceneLines if necessary
00577   static const float eps = 1e-4;
00578   static const float sqeps = 1e-8;
00579   if(line1.Length()<eps || line2.Length()<eps)
00580     return;
00581   
00582   vector2f l1_p0 = line1.P0();
00583   vector2f l1_p1 = line1.P1();
00584   vector2f l1_r0 = l1_p0-loc;
00585   vector2f l1_r1 = l1_p1-loc;
00586   vector2f l2_p0 = line2.P0();
00587   vector2f l2_p1 = line2.P1();
00588   vector2f l2_r0 = l2_p0-loc;
00589   vector2f l2_r1 = l2_p1-loc;
00590   
00591   //Ensure that r0 vector to r1 vector is in the positive right-handed order
00592   if( l1_r0.cross(l1_r1)<0.0 ){
00593     swap(l1_r0,l1_r1);
00594     swap(l1_p0,l1_p1);
00595   }
00596   if( l2_r0.cross(l2_r1)<0.0 ){
00597     swap(l2_r0,l2_r1);
00598     swap(l2_p0,l2_p1);
00599   }
00600   
00601   if( (l1_r0.cross(l2_r0)>=0.0 && l1_r1.cross(l2_r0)>=0.0) || (l2_r1.cross(l1_r0)>=0.0 && l2_r1.cross(l2_r1)>=0.0) )
00602     return; //No Line interaction
00603   bool intersects, rayOcclusion1, rayOcclusion2;
00604   
00605   //completeOcclusion = line1.intersects(loc,l2_p0,false, false, true) && line1.intersects(loc,l2_p1,false, false, true);
00606   
00607   intersects = line2.intersects(line1,false,false,false);
00608   rayOcclusion1 = line2.intersects(loc,l1_r0, false); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p0 intersects line2
00609   rayOcclusion2 = line2.intersects(loc,l1_r1, false); // The semi-infinite ray from loc and passing through line1.p1 intersects line2
00610   
00611   vector2f p;
00612   if(intersects){
00613     //line1 and line2 intersect
00614     vector2f mid = line2.intersection(line1,false,false);
00615     if( (l1_p0-mid).cross(l2_p0-mid) > 0.0){
00616       //Delete the right hand part of line2
00617       line2 = line2f(mid,l2_p1);
00618       line2f l(mid, l2_p0);
00619       if(l.intersects(loc,l1_r0,false)){
00620         p = l.intersection(loc,l1_p0,false, true);
00621         if((l2_p0-p).sqlength()>sqeps)  //Part of the right hand part of line2 extends beyond line1, it may still be visible
00622           sceneLines.push_back(line2f(l2_p0, p));
00623       }
00624     }else{
00625       //Delete the left hand part of line2
00626       line2 = line2f(l2_p0,mid);
00627       line2f l(mid, l2_p1);
00628       if(l.intersects(loc,l1_r1,false)){
00629         p = l.intersection(loc,l1_p1,false, true);
00630         if((l2_p1-p).sqlength()>sqeps)  //Part of the left hand part of line2 extends beyond line1, it may still be visible
00631           sceneLines.push_back(line2f(l2_p1, p));
00632       }
00633     }
00634   }else{ 
00635     bool completeOcclusion = line1.intersects(line2f(loc,l2_p0),false, false, true) && line1.intersects(line2f(loc,l2_p1),false, false, true);
00636     
00637     bool occlusion0 = rayOcclusion1 && !line2.intersects(line2f(loc,l1_p0), false, false, false);  // line1.p0 is in front of, and occludes line2
00638     bool occlusion1 = rayOcclusion2 && !line2.intersects(line2f(loc,l1_p1), false, false, false); // line1.p1 is in front of, and occludes line2
00639     if(completeOcclusion){
00640       //Trim the line to zero length
00641       line2 = line2f(0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0);
00642     }else if(occlusion0 && occlusion1){
00643       //line2 is partially occluded in the middle by line1. Break up into 2 segments, make line2 one segment, push back the other segment to the sceneLines list
00644       vector2f mid;
00645       mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc,l1_p0),false, true);
00646       // newLine2 = the unoccluded part of line2 at its right hand end
00647       line2f newLine2(l2_p0,mid);
00648       mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc,l1_p1),false, true);
00649       line2 = newLine2;
00650       // save the unoccluded part of line2 at its left hand end, if any
00651       if((mid-l2_p1).sqlength()>sqeps)
00652         sceneLines.push_back(line2f(mid,l2_p1));
00653     }else if(occlusion0){
00654       //The left hand end of line2 is occluded, trim it
00655       vector2f mid = line2.intersection(loc,l1_p0,false, true);
00656       line2 = line2f(l2_p0,mid);
00657     }else if(occlusion1){
00658       //The right hand end of line2 is occluded, trim it
00659       vector2f mid = line2.intersection(line2f(loc,l1_p1),false, true);
00660       line2 = line2f(mid,l2_p1);
00661     }
00662   }
00663 }
00664 
00665 vector<line2f> VectorMap::sceneRender(vector2f loc, float a0, float a1)
00666 {
00667   //FunctionTimer ft("Scene Render");
00668   static const float eps = 0.001;
00669   static const float MinRange = 0.03;
00670   static const float MaxRange = 5.0;
00671   static const unsigned int MaxLines = 200;
00672   
00673   vector2f leftMargin, rightMargin;
00674   rightMargin.heading(a0);
00675   leftMargin.heading(a1);
00676   bool obtuseView = rightMargin.cross(leftMargin)<=0.0;
00677   
00678   vector<line2f> scene, sceneCleaned;
00679   vector<line2f> linesList;
00680   vector<int>* locVisibilityList;
00681   
00682   scene.clear();
00683   sceneCleaned.clear();
00684   linesList.clear();
00685   
00686   if(preRenderExists){
00687     locVisibilityList = getVisibilityList(loc);
00688   }else{
00689     locVisibilityList = new vector<int>;
00690     *locVisibilityList = getSceneLines(loc,MaxRange);
00691   }
00692   for(unsigned int i=0; i<locVisibilityList->size(); i++){
00693     linesList.push_back(lines[locVisibilityList->at(i)]);
00694   }
00695   unsigned int i, j;
00696   for(i=0; i<linesList.size() && i<MaxLines; i++){
00697     line2f curLine = linesList[i];
00698     //Check if any part of curLine is unoccluded by present list of lines, as seen from loc
00699     for(j=0;j<scene.size() && curLine.Length()>=eps; j++){
00700       if(scene[j].Length()<eps)
00701         continue;
00702       trimOcclusion(loc, scene[j], curLine,linesList);
00703     }
00704     
00705     if( curLine.Length()>eps ){ //At least part of curLine is unoccluded
00706       for(j=0; j<scene.size(); j++){
00707         if(scene[j].Length()<eps)
00708           continue;
00709         trimOcclusion(loc, curLine, scene[j],linesList);
00710       }
00711       //add the visible part of curLine
00712       scene.push_back(curLine);
00713     }
00714   }
00715   
00716   if(linesList.size()>=MaxLines){
00717     char buf[2048];
00718     sprintf(buf,"Runaway Analytic Scene Render at %.30f,%.30f, %.3f : %.3f\u00b0",V2COMP(loc),DEG(a0),DEG(a1));
00719     TerminalWarning(buf);
00720   }
00721   for(i=0; i<scene.size(); i++){
00722     if(scene[i].Length()>eps)
00723       sceneCleaned.push_back(scene[i]);
00724   }
00725   return sceneCleaned;
00726 }
